relation: Darrow2 - #94 Regardless of the physical pain they feel the young children continue to sing, believing in the melody that was taught to them in their long journey.
Darrow2 - #93 Although seemingly impervious to damage, the alien Giegue suddenly begins to lose his composure when faced with this bittersweet melody.
Darrow2 - #92 As Ness closes his eyes and looks into his heart, something appears. A young boy and his two friends sing a song as a last resort in their battle against an invading alien.
Darrow2 - #91 As Ness awakens from his unconcious state, he comes to find he's in yet another unfamiliar place. A place...that has some very decent music.
Darrow2 - #90 All of the pain and fear building until this point bursts forth as Jeff breaks down. With defeat hanging just inches away, all of his hopes of saving the day are now gone.
